welcome.title: Welcome to TokenSets!
welcome.subtitle: Start here if you're looking for a simple way to get started.
welcome.getting-started-subtitle: Now that you've created your new account, you can deposit ETH or other Ethereum based tokens into your account to buy Sets.
welcome.already-have-an-account-subtitle: If you've already made account before, try logging in with the original login method you previously used.
